website_summaries.verdict: While they have nice features that cold weather enthusiasts appreciate, they aren't practical for everybody, especially smaller individuals or those with shorter legs.
pros: Crafted with the needs of skiers in mind, thanks to the fiber blend that wards off moisture and the 5% Elastane that keeps them in place
Also has padded soles and shins
cons: Tend to run large and fit somewhat bulky in some ski boots
May be too long on some wearers
Reports of wearing out fairly quickly after typical wear

customer_reviews.title: Slightly thicker than the other versions
customer_reviews.text: This sock was slightly thicker than the other colors I ordered of the same brand. This sock is also longer than the new normal pattern. A little padding in all the same places but the white and pink definitely has more cushion. Not sure how to tell the difference before ordering, packaging white vs purple were the same but different vs the black that I ordered. The black and purple are of the same length and are both slightly thinner than the white. It has the same thickness as the eurosock version that has the flower pattern on it.
customer_reviews.author: aaaa

customer_reviews.title: If you want ski socks knee socks these are pretty good. If you want padding you wont find ...
customer_reviews.text: If you want ski socks knee socks these are pretty good. If you want padding you wont find much if any. The 'padding' is a very slightly thicker weave in the striped areas - hardly any different padding then a normal sock. Looks dramatic with the color but dont be fooled, that is not padding. All that said they fit well, did not fall down and were warm to about 20 degrees F with a liner sock. Any colder and I would go with a thicker sock. Finally, they were frayed at the rub points after four days of hard all day moguls. I doubt they would last more than a season to someone that skis often.
customer_reviews.author: Misarakedad

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of cushions around toes, heels, shins.  Kept my feet dry.
customer_reviews.text: these socks are awesome! I wore them skiing 2 days and my feet were never wet, never cold. (and we skiied from 8 am til 4:30 pm straight.) They had just the right amount of cushion around the toes, heels, and the front of my shins. I wear a women's shoe size 8.5 and these socks fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Working Mom in California

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a recent ski trip. I wear a 6.5 and they were big on my feet. They were fairly warm but after a wearing ski boots/skiing for a while my feet started to feel wet even though they weren't. I think they keep you warm but they aren't good at wicking away the moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime M.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps My Feet Much Warmer
customer_reviews.text: As someone whose feet almost get instantly cold while skiing, I have definitely noticed difference in heat retention while using these socks. They've relatively thin, so they allow for a more fitted ski boot and yet still manage to keep me much warmer than traditional, thicker ski socks. You can definitely feel the compression on the sock -- they're noticeably tighter than regular ski socks, particularly around the calf -- but not so tight that they're painful. I'm a women's size 7.5/8 and a small size fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: and were nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband as he is an avid snowboarder, and he really likes them. They go all the way over his calves and don't slide down, and were nice and warm!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hildenbrand

customer_reviews.title: Good sock - not so much for skiing
customer_reviews.text: This sock indicated it was relatively thin, so I tried it, but it's not really thin. It's actually fairly thick, but it is soft, comfortable, and warm, so I use it with my work boots and just as an everyday sock in the winter. Some people like a thicker sock for skiing. I can't stand it, so I don't use it for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous2

customer_reviews.title: The best pair of athletic socks I've ever bought.  Well worth the money if you're planning on skiing!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 13 and these were not only comfortable but probably were the most comfortable and nice feeling of athletic equipment I've ever bought. They had reinforcement in all the right spots to fit ski boots, kept my feet warm (had a bit of a toe chill at 25 degrees F), and best of all, are not wool which irritates my skin. If you, like me, have been breaking out, getting rashes, or scratching like crazy over the years as I have, buy these socks. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Drue

customer_reviews.title: Great Ski Socks
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were renting skis and realized that we did not have socks for our boots. We ordered these and they were great. Thick in the right places but overall not thick enough to prevent your boot from sliding on easily (boots always seem to be tough to get on). I would recommend these to anyone looking for a good ski sock.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Hengehold

customer_reviews.title: Too big, cheap
customer_reviews.text: After two years in the closet I decided to put them on. I ordered M - shoe size 7.5- socks are about 5 sizes too big! I washed them in hot water hoping they would shrink, instead pink parts dyed white and still are humongously big and extra long above the knee! They also feel not warm. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: beata

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm but a bit big for a ski ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice and warm but a bit big for a ski sock. I had to tune the boot an extra couple turns on each buckle as I was starting to get a hot spot. IT was fine after that. If you are a mellow-ish cruiser, or just having with the kids throwing some snowballs, these are nice socks for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Majordomobillybojangle

customer_reviews.title: Great price, solid product.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and they do stay up pretty much no matter what you do. Good padding on the shin but after walking in ski boots for a while, you do start to feel the rub even through the padding. The toes get slightly cold after a few hours which was unfortunate but for a quick skiing session they definitely get the job done. I would recommend the buy given that there are truly no perfect ski socks for this price. Unbeatable price and quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Sariego

customer_reviews.title: Made more of a difference than expected
customer_reviews.text: No shin bang this year and very warm toes! Cannot believe socks are so important in making the boots fit better and reduce the chaffing and cold toes! Padded in the right places, felt a bit tight initially, but after the first couple of runs everything settled down. These socks won't magically make your ski boots "comfortable" when walking around, but the skiing felt great.
customer_reviews.author: Nutner

customer_reviews.title: Runs Large
customer_reviews.text: Not as warm as I needed for snowy, below freezing temps. Soft and comfy on foot, but threads inside the sock adhere to my ankle braclette. Sizing runs 2 sizes larger than expected. Beautiful colors and pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Surfin Girl

customer_reviews.title: I love these socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks. They are thick and warm. I love just wearing them around the house. I love the cushioned soles. I wished I would have bought two. I wear a size 11 shoe and the large fits wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Warm and Toasty
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! My feet are never warm, but these have kept my feet toasty in my ski boots. They fit just as I had hoped (up to my knee) and they're super soft on the inside. Just be aware- they're not friendly with velcro! The top velcro strap of my boot got stuck on the sock the first time I wore them and pulled out some of the material ):
customer_reviews.author: jbrousseau

customer_reviews.title: Runs big in the foot and short in the calf
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking high and low for a quality ski sick that would fit my wife calves. Unfortunately, I'm still looking. First, these socks have absolutely no wool in them. I put them on for about 10 minutes, and my feet already felt swampy. Although they do go up over my calves, they do not go up to my knees and kept rolling down. Also, since I wear a woman's size 11 boots, I ordered the large (that says it starts at a size 10.5). The heel of the sock is up near my ankle. Needless to say, these are getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica P. Hupper

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks for skiing
customer_reviews.text: Before I got these socks, my feet and legs hurt after skiing. After I got these, the next time I went skiing my feet were more comfortable and they didn't hurt after. I cannot guarantee it was the socks (or just different boots), but I think it was the socks. They fit great and I have pretty large calves. I love them for all kinds of outdoor activities in the cold. Thick and cushion without being too thick. I bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jennfer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my first time skiing. My toes were VERY cold in the beginning but I think that was due to me just putting my boots on a few minutes prior. After my toes finally warmed up I didn’t feel cold the rest of my three day trip. They were very comfy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Blady

customer_reviews.title: Great quality fit and feel
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, fit and feel. More than light weight but definitely not thick. Padding is perfect. Love them. -Ski patroller
customer_reviews.author: Rich W

customer_reviews.title: Best winter sock you will every buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect socks for winter. Have bought hundred's of socks in my time and these are the best - absolutely. And they was beautifully - do not shrink!!! Love them.
customer_reviews.author: beth worden

customer_reviews.title: Dollar Store socks
customer_reviews.text: Cheap socks. Does not feel like quality. Their fit does not feel good. Stitching is just a long tube, no real contour in it.
customer_reviews.author: Claude K.

customer_reviews.title: Best ski socks!
customer_reviews.text: Stop searching for ski socks! These are the real deal, believe me, I have purchased several different brands over the years. They are soft, fit well, have padding in the appropriate areas and stay up! I wear a woman's shoe size 9.5 and a medium fit perfectly. Back to purchase another pair.
customer_reviews.author: LA Lady

customer_reviews.title: Feet still cold :(
customer_reviews.text: The socks are comfortable, but my feet were still frozen at 40 degrees. :( I have a different set of eurosocks that are thinner, and I expected these to be warmer, but they are not. I am disappointed as I bought these for a trip to the Alps, but they can't take the cold of Utah. Need to find another set.
customer_reviews.author: MarieCP

customer_reviews.title: Warm and dry
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these socks every day to ski in North Carolina. In 25 degree weather and snow, they are keeping my feet and calves toasty warm! The thickness is perfect in my ski boots! Thank you! Love these socks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Let my feet nice and warm while skiing ( -5 to -8 some days ) Cushioning didn’t keep my calves from bruising but they’re kind of muscular so it’s orivably inevitable
customer_reviews.author: V. Womack

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: Great Socks. THey stay up. THey have Ski specific padding. They are the right medium thickness for boots. They look great too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Mclean

customer_reviews.title: Soft and snuggly comfortable ski socks
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. First time I've bought this product. It comes up quite generous (a little long) BUT comfortable and snuggly. Seem to be wearing well. I'd recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Flame

customer_reviews.title: Quality ski socks
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for hubbie. He skied with them the other day and said he loved them. His feet never got cold. He also said they were thick enough on his shin bone not to leave a sore spot from the boots.
customer_reviews.author: firehawk

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks feel GREAT, very soft and comfortable. I wear a women's size 9 shoe, and the mediums are slightly too large for me. I was able to wear them but should have ordered a small.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Must have for long days of skiing!
customer_reviews.text: for skiing these are perfect. The extra padding was helpful [per my husband] and they kept him warm. He has other liners that don't have the padding, which he wears everyday or has painfully cold toes. He said these were well worth the money for his ski trip. When you are paying that money for skiing, having the right gear is well worth it or you will be uncomfortable instead of enjoying the experience.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: thick
customer_reviews.text: Super warm...could never cram this much material in my ski boots. Nice sock, just too thick for me.
customer_reviews.author: Craig B Street

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: My feet are always cold and these are super comfortable and soft. They definitely serve their purpose!
customer_reviews.author: needed this

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: After wearing these 3 times a hole wore through the foot in both socks of one pair. So far the other pair is intact. The quality seems to be hit or miss.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: expected more cushion...after a day on mountain had to revert to thinner socks to fit comfortably in snowboard boots. Great quality, sadly doesn't work for me. Fingers cross to find a way to repurpose.
customer_reviews.author: tanya

customer_reviews.title: Too thick and it stinks as it does not wick sweat
customer_reviews.text: Thick ski socks. Took off 2 stars because it does not wick sweat and instead absorbs it so the socks are stinky after skiing.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, and fits great.  But won't last long.
customer_reviews.text: Great sock but I noticed it has started to catch/kink in many areas on both pairs I bought. So far has lasted 1 ski season. Probably has 1 more in them. Works great, fits, and is comfortable. But won't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Magnum PI

customer_reviews.title: Great socks for Winter sports
customer_reviews.text: Out of three different types of socks I bought for my ski trip, these were my favorite. They were very comfortable and warm and wicked the moisture away from my feat throughout the day. Like the others, they were a little tight on my muscular calves, but they stretched to accommodate.
customer_reviews.author: Zadira

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed by this sock, very thick and comfortable. tried to buy again but they were out
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton E. Bull

customer_reviews.title: Very picky wearer.
customer_reviews.text: These are the only socks my daughter will wear when it is cold.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Ablett

customer_reviews.title: Fits large
customer_reviews.text: They get baggy quickly and found that even though I am in the upper end of the size bracket they end up bunching at the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It seems to fit just fine. The socks are very cost too but watch ...
customer_reviews.text: The socks are very warm and fits well! I didn't have a chance to try it out on the slopes but I did put them on and wear my ski boots with it for 10 minutes at home. It seems to fit just fine. The socks are very cost too but watch out for Velcro! It pulls the threads right out if you are not careful. I was surprised how fast the thread come loose.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed with the product!
customer_reviews.text: Got some other color than what I picked and they are bigger than described. Not happy with product and it's a pain having to return it. I gave it away as a gift to someone that can wear a larger sock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ski socks.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter skis all the time and she absolutely loves them. They wash up very nicely. Fit is perfect, price is perfect, transaction was wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: 9 degrees, no problem!
customer_reviews.text: Snowboarding on 9 degree day w/ toe warmers... Amazing!!! So good No toe warmers were even used on second day (20 degrees).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great socks for skiing.
customer_reviews.text: Went skiing in Vail this past winter, and loved these socks. Warm, dry, comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jeff hollis

customer_reviews.title: day on the slopes.
customer_reviews.text: wore with ski boots. Comfortable and warm all day in very cold weather!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they look great and feel great
customer_reviews.text: the socks were very cozy and warm. they look great and feel great. Huge problem is after one wash they look 2 years old! they still feel good and are warm... but after one wash com on man,,,,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best wool-free ski sock out there
customer_reviews.text: My son (10) and I both love these ski socks. They fit well, are comfortable and are wool-free!
customer_reviews.author: Thera99

customer_reviews.title: Thicker than my other ski socks
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my smartwool and stoic brand ski socks, these are definitely thicker (bulkier). I am not certain that thicker is better or worse. Since I don't need the extra thickness, I gave them away.
customer_reviews.author: Ron M

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good quality Fast delivery Will buy again ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good quality Fast delivery Will buy again A+++
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Elizondo

customer_reviews.title: Long socks
customer_reviews.text: I got these to wear under a post surgery boot but they seem like they’d work well for skiing too.
customer_reviews.author: Jason in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT SKI SOCKS
customer_reviews.text: These are the only ski socks my family wears. They keep their feet dry and very warm. We highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: bon

customer_reviews.title: Too big.
customer_reviews.text: I have a size 8 foot and these are loose and long.
customer_reviews.author: Sven Golly

customer_reviews.title: Fit fine, quality good but I expected them to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit fine, quality good but I expected them to keep my feet warmer and a bit heavier thickness
customer_reviews.author: golfinggoofie01

customer_reviews.title: Warm, to knee, cushioned
customer_reviews.text: I was getting shin bang and these helped. Very warm and wool-free.
customer_reviews.author: MonkeyButt

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and colors
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and colors! I cannot wear them with my running shoes but they work fine with my winter boots.
customer_reviews.author: Daring Young Red

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal, Super Price
customer_reviews.text: Great socks--extremely comfortable and breathable. I purchased a similar pair from EMS and paid twice the amount--these are a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Julia C.K

customer_reviews.title: Ran a tad big in the women’s size, but isn’t a. Uh deal.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Warm, soft, comfortable, and versatile. Wore skiing and now wear at home on cold days, with boots, and to sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Everett

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star
customer_reviews.text: Great socks! Comfortable and really warm! Not necessary to wear liners.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Bad product for Ski
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it is very very late to send out this products. It is too thick to wear on Ski boots. Bad quality like a mop cloth. Color are more pinky than the photo. I even don’t want wear it to keep warm.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Too long
customer_reviews.text: Much longer sock than expected. I am sure it will be ok, it is just a sock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Solid winter sports sock; I always wish such socks were more substantial, but I understand the desire for lack of bulk. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Another Literary One

customer_reviews.title: good thick socks
customer_reviews.text: good thick socks. I love Eurosocks, but these were thicker than I expected. Still good socks, if you like thick.
customer_reviews.author: Bugsy

customer_reviews.title: I keep buying more
customer_reviews.text: Continue buying more pairs for each ski season. Great socks. I wear them out.
customer_reviews.author: HS Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Really didn't work very well. My feet still got cold so I ordered some rechargeable socks and those work great! Also, not crazy about how high up these socks went.
customer_reviews.author: dollydog

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Soft, warm and breathable. Soft enough for someone with sensitive skin. I am a women's 9, so I chose the medium, based on the size chart. I find them to be too big, not in the calf, but in the foot. I'll keep them for ice skating, but I'll be ordering a small for skiing.
customer_reviews.author: HM.

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks, but tend to stretch out.
customer_reviews.text: These feel great on my feet but tend to stretch out throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm, not particularly durable.
customer_reviews.text: Very warm, comfortable, and the padding feels good. However, they started wearing down and fraying after just a couple uses.
customer_reviews.author: amazon_138

customer_reviews.title: Don't stay tight - baggy and fall down.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for these due to their reviews by others. They are alright when you put them on, but after a little while they just get baggy and fall down.
customer_reviews.author: chelleys2004

customer_reviews.title: Too thick for ski boots
customer_reviews.text: Im sure these will work great for general purpose socks but for well fitted ski boots these were too thick.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great socks! Love how they stay in place and they are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: yrsokul

customer_reviews.title: Thick
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit thicker than I would have liked. I work at a ski area, and they are good for wearing pack boots, but not ideal for ski boots because of the thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these socks. He says it keeps his feet "nice and warm." Even wore them for his basketball game! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cha

customer_reviews.title: Socks were used before
customer_reviews.text: i bought 2 pairs of socks. One of them was new but the other was used before and it came in another packaging. otherwise socks are fine. sad that there is no quality check to make sure that they are brand new as stated
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina L.

customer_reviews.title: ... wore it just once but they are soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I wore it just once but they are soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Monicka

customer_reviews.title: nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He loves it. He said it fitted him well, nice and warm, and very comfortable. He likes them so much, he wears them even when not skiiing. Winter in New York was rough this year, so these socks were my husband's go to.
customer_reviews.author: mia a. petrillo

customer_reviews.title: The perfect ski sock.
customer_reviews.text: I order these every year, only because I typically lose the ones I have. They're literally the perfect ski sock. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Quality sock & price reflects it
customer_reviews.text: Always buy a good sock if you can afford it. Don't die with a crap sock on your foot. I wear a 10 inch boot and these are perfect
customer_reviews.author: George Haralson

customer_reviews.title: somewhat too thick for ski socks
customer_reviews.text: somewhat too thick for ski socks IMO but very soft and warm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great socks!
customer_reviews.text: Yes yes yes. Warm wonderful well made and comfortable ski socks. Will buy many more, as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic ski socks
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic ski socks. Sizing seemed a little large in me. I’m 9.5 men’s and I ended up liking the way the medium fit as opposed to the large. Large was a bit long and the heel went up too far ( the sole was too long so it the cut for the heel was too far up on the back of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Oscamaha

customer_reviews.title: Great ski socks!
customer_reviews.text: Warm and soft! Great shin padding that helped with the inevitable shin soreness from ski boots!
customer_reviews.author: A. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Poor material quality
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend used 4 times and showing lots of wear. Fit was good, was comfortable
customer_reviews.author: D. John Crannell

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable, cushioned socks
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable, cushioned socks. They fit well in my ski boots and made my day of skiing much more comfortable. They're pricey, but I haven't been able to find anything comparable at a cheaper cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great sock soft and keep my feet warm that’s all you can ask for they worked
customer_reviews.author: martycoar

customer_reviews.title: Not durable. Not for this price.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a couple of days skiing and it still works but looks not for long time. I’ll not buy it again at least for that price. It doesn’t cost more than 10 backs. $8 is fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: I wear a 9.5US and these fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sock, definitely not as warm as a sock with wool. But these are very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, fairy warm socks.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I react poorly to wool, so finding comfortable ski socks is a challenge, but these are soft and comfy. My new boots are bothering the inside lower shin; I'm going to get footbeds, but in the meantime I twisted the sock a little to position the striped shin cushions more towards the inside of the leg, and was less bruised after wearing them that way. I get chilly easily and have tight boots, but did fairly well with these socks - I stayed warmer wearing these on a cold day than I had with my previous pair of socks on a warmer day. Toes were still a little chilly, but not enough to be a major focus.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Gerat ski socks
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and stay dry during the whole ski day. A little thick so they will be good if your boots are a little loose; otherwise, you should go for a thinner sock.
customer_reviews.author: E.M.

customer_reviews.title: Used socks???
customer_reviews.text: When I order new socks, I do not appreciate receiving used ones!
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: She tells me that they are perfect and she's way more comfortable when working on her ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter who works in an exceptionally cold dental office. She tells me that they are perfect and she's way more comfortable when working on her patients.
customer_reviews.author: Ancient Activist, Aspiring Alchemist

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son said these are so warm and comfortable for snowboarding
customer_reviews.author: Arens

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful looking socks that stretched out immediately in the foot
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looking socks that stretched out immediately in the foot. Upon the first wash, they completely pilled and looked like very old socks. Very disappointed because I did my research and read the reviews. Maybe this was a fluke and I got a pair of defective socks.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Hample

customer_reviews.title: love eurosock
customer_reviews.text: i've owned several differnt brands of ski socks and these are by far my favorite. I first bought a pair form the REI outlet, and after years of contunually digging these out over the other brands, I finally bought another pair. I love the way they never slip, wrinkle or rub during a long day on the hill.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Steele

customer_reviews.title: Warm-a-licious!
customer_reviews.text: Great socks! Soft, padded and warm! Just the thing for -15 shredding....
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great ski socks
customer_reviews.text: Fit is just as listed on package. Socks were comfortable and provided good support with boots. Slight padding at shins. Necessary for skiing, particularly for first timers.
customer_reviews.author: L. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent socks!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing socks, very comfy, used them the whole day for snowboarding and they exceeded expectations. Will buy another pair!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Hole in the sock after 2 days of skiing!
customer_reviews.text: We are so disappointed. These socks seemed really comfortable and warm but with a hole in the toe after 2 days of skiing it's pretty poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Carver

customer_reviews.title: Good ones just choose a smaller size
customer_reviews.text: I found the size to be on the big side. I tried to see if after washing it will shrink but no luck :-) :-(
customer_reviews.author: raanan kesar

product_meta.title: Eurosocks Ski Zone Snow Skiing Socks -1112
product_meta.description:
Specifically Designed 
EUROSOCK Ski and Board socks are specifically designed for winter athletes. Every style is engineered with technical sport-specific features with patented fibers developed through years of research. EUROSOCK uses elastic layers that work perfectly together to stimulate blood flow improving oxygen delivery to your muscles reducing foot and leg swelling, lactic acid production and cramping
Advanced Technology 
Keep your feet dry warm and comfortable with our exclusive DryStat or MicroSupreme fiber that provides both warmth and protection with optimum moisture control that reduces the growth of bacteria and fungus to promote a healthier environment for your feet. Our advanced knitting techniques brings together spandex and sport-specific technical fibers with a patented interlocked diamond pattern providing the ideal fit and support you expect for challenging environments.
Reduce Injuries 
Reduce Injuries - Plantar fasciitis, shin splints, calf cramps, pulled muscles, Achilles and heel cup issues, blisters and blood pooling, not an overnight quick fix but part of your long term foot care program. Lightly padded at the stress points to promote comfort and support, eliminate abrasion shin and foot stress from the rigidity of ski and board boots providing winter athletes support and comfort in the most extreme skiing environment.
Better Performance 
Perform better, recover faster, and boost your performance, socks designed with the winter athlete in mind, your feet and legs will thank you.

EUROSOCKS never outsourced, compression experts since 1998, Arcos is the manufacturer of great sock brands like Sox, Travelsox, Vitalsox, Caresox, and Worksox, Made in Italy.
feature_bullets: SKI ZONE – Means comfort zone, adapts perfectly to ski boots, medium weight ski socks with our best technical features creating a one of kind ski sock
DYNAMIC THICKNESS - Provides cushioning support, eliminates friction and absorbs shock, extremely soft and comfortable against the rigidity of ski boots
PROVIDES SUPPORT- Elastic arch band & ankle brace, smooth toe, flat knit construction insure both a wrinkle-free fit and feel, maximum support without bulk
MICRO-SUPREME TECHNOLOGY- Creates moisture management, superior wicking and self-drying capabilities that keep feet warm and dry, Dry Feet = Less Blisters
100% MADE IN ITALY - Eurosocks, advanced technology, exclusive materials, superior craftsmanship, creates the highest quality of socks you will ever wear
